item.title: Book Club Announcement: Eloquent Ruby by Russ Olsen
item.dc:creator: chuck@teachmetocode.com (Charles Max Wood)
item.description: Our next book club episode will be on December 6. We will be reading Eloquent Ruby by Russ Olsen. Of course, we’ll be inviting the author. The book has been recommended by several panelists and we’re excited for what it holds in store. Start reading and join us in December!
item.content:encoded:
Our next book club episode will be on December 6. We will be reading Eloquent Ruby by Russ Olsen. Of course, we’ll be inviting the author. The book has been recommended by several panelists and we’re excited for what it holds in store.

Start reading and join us in December!
